Package com.aep.dao

Interface TeachRequestDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
TeachRequestDAOImpl
public interface TeachRequestDAO
TeachRequestDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the TeachRequest table in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createTeachRequest(TeachRequestDTO request)
    Creates a new teach request and stores it in the database.
    List<TeachRequestDTO>
    getNotificationsForProfessional(int professionalId)
    Retrieves a list of teach requests with notifications enabled for a specific professional.
    List<TeachRequestDTO>
    getTeachRequestsByInstitution(int institutionId)
    Retrieves a list of teach requests associated with a specific institution.
    void
    setNotificationForProfessional(int requestId, boolean notification)
    Sets the notification flag for a specific teach request.
    void
    updateTeachRequestStatus(int requestId, String status)
    Updates the status of a teach request (e.g., Pending, Accepted, Rejected).

  • Method Details

    • createTeachRequest

      void createTeachRequest(TeachRequestDTO request)
      Creates a new teach request and stores it in the database.
      Parameters:
      request - the TeachRequestDTO object containing details of the teach request

    • updateTeachRequestStatus

      void updateTeachRequestStatus(int requestId, String status)
      Updates the status of a teach request (e.g., Pending, Accepted, Rejected).
      Parameters:
      requestId - the ID of the teach request
      status - the new status of the request

    • getTeachRequestsByInstitution

      List<TeachRequestDTO> getTeachRequestsByInstitution(int institutionId)
      Retrieves a list of teach requests associated with a specific institution.
      Parameters:
      institutionId - the ID of the institution
      Returns:
      a list of TeachRequestDTO objects representing the teach requests

    • setNotificationForProfessional

      void setNotificationForProfessional(int requestId, boolean notification)
      Sets the notification flag for a specific teach request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the ID of the teach request
      notification - the notification flag to set (true to enable, false to disable)

    • getNotificationsForProfessional

      List<TeachRequestDTO> getNotificationsForProfessional(int professionalId)
      Retrieves a list of teach requests with notifications enabled for a specific professional.
      Parameters:
      professionalId - the ID of the academic professional
      Returns:
      a list of TeachRequestDTO objects representing the notifications
